casebody.data:
State
v.
Phillip Vance Smith, II 407P03-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2017 *362Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Phillip Vance Smith, II, for Smith, Phillip Vance, II.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of November 2016 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of January 2017."
